title: OpenAI says Sam Altman exiting as CEO, was 'not consistently candid' with board
description: OpenAI’s board of directors said Friday that Sam Altman will step down as CEO and will be replaced by technology chief Mira Murati.

title: Authorities reviewed 600 pieces of evidence before charging suspect in death of Jewish protester
description: Authorities examined 600 pieces of evidence and spoke to 60 witnesses before charging a college professor with two felonies when they say he allegedly caused fatal injuries to a Jewish protester during a dueling pro-Israel and pro-Palestinian rally this month in California.

title: How Walmart is using high tech to prepare for the holiday rush
description: NBC’s Vicky Nguyen shares an exclusive behind the scenes look at Walmart’s high tech, robotic food fulfillment center that can ship twice as much product as a traditional facility, keeping the store shelves stocked — even during the busy holiday season!

title: Whistleblower warns about risks teens face on social media
description: New reporting reveals a former Meta senior consultant warned company leaders that Instagram was harmful to teens and young children. Facebook whistleblower Frances Haugen joins to talk about social media’s harm to kids and why the new testimony could shake things up.

title: TikTok bans content promoting Bin Laden's 'Letter to America'
description: TikTok is pulling videos from the app that are promoting Osama Bin Laden's "Letter to America"  after they started gaining momentum. Users are focusing on one paragraph in the letter that refers to Palestine.

title: TikTok removes hashtag for Osama bin Laden’s ‘Letter to America’ after viral videos circulate
description: TikTok removed the hashtag #lettertoamerica from its search function after videos about Osama bin Laden’s 2002 “Letter to America” went viral on the platform and were reuploaded to X.
